sentences.english: Happened, the vessel motorboat to save not escape.
sentences.chinese: 刚巧，有艘汽艇经过，拯救尚未逃生者。

sentences.english: His woollen cloth measures ten yards exactly.
sentences.chinese: 这块毛料刚巧是十码长。

sentences.english: Kangkong happens to be my kids ' favorite leafy vegetable .
sentences.chinese: 刚巧是我的孩子们最喜爱的叶菜蔬菜。

sentences.english: Evergreen namely life he knows you come back, take away the baby.
sentences.chinese: 知秋刚巧回来，常绿即命他带走婴儿。

sentences.english: I happened to meet my lost-lost friend in the party.
sentences.chinese: 我刚巧在聚会上碰到了一个失去联系多年的老朋友。

sentences.english: There happened to be a policeman around the corner, so I asked him the way.
sentences.chinese: 街角处刚巧有一位警察，我便向他问路。

sentences.english: They were talking about someone and he just came in the room.
sentences.chinese: 她们正在评论辩论或人，他刚巧就进来了。

sentences.english: The rain, colors, and contrast just brought it all together.
sentences.chinese: 雨，色彩，对比度刚巧凑合地在一起。

sentences.english: She happened to be out when we called.
sentences.chinese: 我们打电话时她刚巧不在家。

sentences.english: Kim’s Note: I happen to know that this is a favorite of Teacher Lee.
sentences.chinese: 我刚巧知道这是李老师最喜欢的一句话。

sentences.english: This is exactly what happens to your skin as a result of prolonged UV-A exposure.
sentences.chinese: 这正是你的皮肤刚巧由于长时间紫外线的曝光。

definition: just by chance/to happen to (just at the right time)/opportune
too bad/unfortunately/as luck would have it
by coincidence/it so happened that/fortunately/against expectation
to run into/to meet (unexpectedly)/to bump into
arriving early can't beat coming at the right time/perfect timing
pinyin: lai2 de5 zao3 bu4 ru2 lai2 de5 qiao3
